entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:43 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:43 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
